originalText.text: Doctor Jiminez is an awesome person, very knowledgeable and a great dentist. He treats every patient with care and concern and gives his undivided attention to any problems that you may have orally. My experience is he took care of all my cavities with no discomfort. Thank you and I will be back every 6 months for cleanings and check ups. üòÅ

originalText.text:
On a Saturday morning I called asking if there was availability for an appointment since my tooth broke the night before.

At 1030am, I was told to come in early so I could be seen before afternoon appointments. I arrived 11am, did paperwork, and was then told that I could leave and expect a call at 2:30pm. At 2:30, I received a call telling me that I should expect another call at around 2:45pm. I decided it was in my best interests to wait at the office.

Finally at 4pm I was seen by the dentist. He was very nice and took care of my teeth in a timely manner.

Unfortunately, a week later my tooth broke again. I went to another dentist who said the first dentist had been too cautious and not done a thorough job.

This is my experience, I did not feel the dental office had a good system for timeliness and then I was left with a broken tooth again in a week. Perhaps my particular dental situation was unlucky but I think it's best to take your business elsewhere. (even if you are like me and this is the only place open and nearby on a Saturday.)

Though the receptionist and dentist were nice people, I believe they did not perform their duties well. The receptionist did not understand appointments and how to set patient's expectations and the dentist did not get the job done.

originalText.text: They're HORRIBLE.  The "dentist" has no idea what he's doing.  Their billing is incompitent and they don't keep records of payment and in the end, I had to have all the work redone!  Go anywhere else if you can.

text.text: They're HORRIBLE.  The "dentist" has no idea what he's doing.  Their billing is incompitent and they don't keep records of payment and in the end, I had to have all the work redone!  Go anywhere else if you can.

originalText.text: My dental visit was excellent and highly recommended to anyone who needs any type of dental work.

text.text: My dental visit was excellent and highly recommended to anyone who needs any type of dental work.
